description: The first cases of internal transmission of the novel coronavirus is recorded
title: First case of COVID19

description: The first death caused by COVID19 in Brazil is recorded by the Ministry of Health
title: First death due to COVID19

description: President Jair Bolsonaro defends the use of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine
title: Jair Bolsonaro praises Hydroxychloroquine

description: President Jair Bolsonaro fires his health minister Luiz Henrique Mandetta
title: Health Minister is fired

description: Brazil's Federal Supreme Court orders the Ministry of Health to resume the disclosure of the accumulated data from the official website
title: Supreme court forces the disclosure of data

description: President Jair Bolsonaro says in an interview broadcast by TV Brasil that he tested positive for COVID19
title: Jair Bolsonaro tests positive for COVID19

description: First Lady Michelle Bolsonaro tests positive for COVID19
title: Michelle Bolsonaro tests positive for COVID19

description: President Jair Bolsonaro says he will not take a coronavirus vaccine
title: Jair Bolsonaro announces he won't take the vaccine

description: President Jair Bolsonaro chooses doctor Marcelo Queiroga to replace Eduardo Pazuello as fourth Minister of Health
title: Marcelo Queiroga, Health minister
